archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.1.9a: a) the type, classification and importance of information that may be handled by the supplier (e.g. commercial information, intellectual property or personally identifiable information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
